package.name: DEBackup
package.shortDescription: Clone and Backup your all tweaks into a single file!

descriptionlist.description: Backup and Restore your tweaks at once! This tool will extract all the installed tweaks to deb file and archive into a single file. You can restore whenever you want! Deb extraction tool credit: redeb by T.Herak
Usage: type "deback" in mobile terminal or SSH.

WARNING 1: DO NOT SHARE THE BACKUP!!!! This backup "Clones" the installed deb files. If you share your backups, then jailbreak itself may run to significant error which may lead to a circumstance that requires re-jailbreak using Semi-Restore or Rollectra.
WARNING 2: Anemone is not restorable. You have to reinstall Anemone in Cydia manually.
